Articles.Content:
I don't like going into the map to see what crew and professions I have aboard. Sometimes I can't even access that screen due to other mods hogging the menu.

It would be nice if there was a mod that brought up a simple crew roster that displayed:

Name

Star Level

Profession

Either 1) When you press a hotkey and/or 2) with the toolbar mod.

Note I'd just want to see crew for the currently selected vessel.

Just a small quality of life tweak I think would be nice.

You could try out [keepfit](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67739), it does have a crew roster of available and assigned crew along with their profession, but I believe it does not include the level. Maybe it's a place to start, though.
